channel.title: Music? dat file?
channel.description: well i was listening to a song on the internet i thought why not just copy it from the temporary files folder than download it? so i listened to it(you cant download it) and went into the temporary files folder at: C:\Documents and Settings\<username>\Local Settings\Temporary Internet Files\ then i found a music file with the songs name that was 1kb and a DAT file with the music's name that was 2.5mb so how do i convert the DAT into a music file?

Convert DAT to mp3/(The file format it was)
Or just open it in your Music player and it normally plays.
